pkgmetadata.longdescription: A collection of IETF & IANA MIBs compiled into PySNMP classes.Note that there is also PySMI package (https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pysmi/) that converts ASN.1 MIBs into PySNMP form.Latest PySNMP (4.3+) invokes PySMI automatically to handle ASN.1 MIBs.See http://pysnmp.sf.net & http://pysmi.sf.net
